game.title: The Missing Heirloom
game.objective: Retrieve the stolen family heirloom from the thief's hideout.
game.description: Lady Regina's priceless locket has been stolen by a notorious thief known as "The Fox." She needs your help to retrieve it before her birthday celebration tonight.
game.reward: A reward of 100 gold pieces and Lady Regina's gratitude.

task.objective: Gather information about The Fox's hideout.
task.description: Visit the local tavern and speak with the bartender, who has heard rumors about The Fox's whereabouts.
Sneak into the abandoned windmill on the outskirts of town, where The Fox is said to be hiding.
Search the hideout for the locket and confront The Fox if necessary.
